review_text: An architectural feat. Peaceful and serene.

Nice Catholic church just near SM Seaside (just 200 meters walk, as per Google).
For the churchgoers, I have included the latest mass schedule.
love this spacious church. the parking area gets full easily so you must be there 30mins to an hour before the mass to secure a parking slot
Very nice chapel at Ramos area
Love the ambience. You definitley feel closer to The Big Man Upstairs.

It is where one can experience a Solemn Mass (priest, acolytes, lectors, psalmist, eucharistic ministers, collectors and the choir
are all prepared) it is Air-conditioned too
A place good for Sunday worship.
very solemn.. if you wanna have a personal space with God, try attending the 6pm mass on weekdays..

As you can see, the chapel is boxy and too big to be called a chapel. Modern look allows it to be airy and surprisingly not humid even if there are few air passages. It has a basement where there's parking spaces, restroom and activity halls.
Everything is from him, we shall give thanks.

Chapel of San Pedro Calungsod - Cebu City
Near SM Seaside City Mall.
The place was Solemn, Ideal for Weddings and renewal of vows.
A bit crowded now than before, but has ushers to move people along and guide them
When I'm here at the chapel I feel God's presence. Ame!
If you want to get married choose this holy and clean church.

Very spacious , lovely choir and air conditioning

The place is super wonderful and very welcoming. It's my first coming to this chapel and totally worth it. Especially on my part, I came home with a lesson that I have heard during the masses. I will surely come back again with my family.
Nice for wedding and Sunday masses
Nice church. Good sound system. It has a very clear voice and aside from that it's air-conditioned.
Conveniently located right across SM and Cebu Ocean Park.
Perfect place to attend the holy mass before going to Cebu Ocean Park & SM Seaside (walking distance only). Spacious and fully air conditioned.
Modern place. Ease of access with lots of open  parking. Lots of construction going on while ongoing service.
it was safe and wide range for car park...place is clean and solemn

Solemn place to attend a mass as it does not have any establishments beside it. Not so crowded chapel and you can easily find a parking slot.

I joined a mass held at the basement. I love how solemn it was and how nice the sounds of their sound system. The choir has a very good voice--intimate and solemn. 2 things to improve: it was very hot and mosquitoes were festive.
A peaceful and spacious place to pray and reflect.
A very solemn and good place to meditae and contemplate with God. Very quite plus it is fully air conditioned.

Solemn place for Religious mass and has functional ground floor area for Reception Area and Dining area. Functional clean rest rooms.
Baptisms and Wedding are welcome
One of the best chapel in Cebu. The chapel is adjacent to the SM Seaside City Cebu and beside Cebu Ocean Park in SRP. An air-conditioned and child friendly chapel.

One of the best places to attend mass. When receiving holy communion there is an order and proper line for receiving communion. Aircon is available in all their masses. Ample space for parking both in the front and back of the church. PWD / Accessible in the main entrance of the church.
This is a beautiful church located in the Seaside Properties area Near SM Seaside right next to New Cebu Ocean Park.

Peacefully. You can pray and enjoy the view.

The chapel or church is just a stone throw away from SM Seaside. So, itd a perfect place to visit and worship before shopping or whatever. And also, this chapel is fully airconditioned. Right beside the chapel, is the newly opened Cebu Ocean Park.
A Roman Catholic Church with a spectacular modern Design showing an open spaces and lot of perking spaces

It was not my first time to attend mass in San Pedro Calungsod Church near at SM Seaside but i am still amazed how solemn the place is. You will not be distracted with the honking of horns from cars or any other noise from the outside. You can give your 100% attention to the celebration.
This Chapel is solemn and is fully air conditioned. This is within SM Seaside property and beside Cebu Ocean Park.

Cool place of worship and for wedding

1st time to visit here love it

A very solemn church. When there, youll feel that youre far from the city center when in fact youre just inside  SM Seaside properties at the Cebu SRP. With ample parking.

Serenely beautiful chapel, in honor of a Filipino saint, near SM. Complete with basement parking and clean comfort rooms. A must place visit to calm down and pray after a busy day or week.
New church but you should have your own private transpo since there's no public transpo available
